concept.shortdesc: In order to enable the ANSI X9.8 PIN - Allow only ANSI PIN blocks access control point, the ANSI X9.8 PIN - Enforce PIN block restrictions must also be enabled.

conbody.p: The ANSI X9.8 PIN - Allow only ANSI PIN blocks access control point cannot be enabled by itself.

When this access control point is enabled, the verb allows reformatting of the PIN block as shown in . ANSI X9.8 PIN - Allow only ANSI PIN blocks
